resources.string:
Reminder is set. Notifications are turned
on.

Reminder is set. Notifications are turned
off.

If the statistics feature for the current list is enabled, products will be added to the statistics every time you check them. The same product can be added to the statistics multiple times. This allows you to uncheck products, reuse the list and still keep track of the checked items.
Select the items that you want to delete, press the delete icon and confirm this action.
Notes: some notes here that take much space. You shoudn\'t be seeing multiple lines.
You don\'t have any shopping lists
Notifications are disabled. Please go to settings and turn them on.

Statistics turned on! Items will be added to the statistics as soon as they are checked.
Delete all data from saved statistics
With this app you can create and manage shopping lists. Lists can be prioritized, have deadlines, reminders and more.

Welcome to the help page of Privacy Friendly Shopping List. This App allows you not only creating lists and adding products to it, but also set priority, deadlines, reminders and add notes to your lists.
Additionally you can keep track of checked items and visualize the total amount spent, or the total number of units purchased, in a diagram.

A shopping list contains products. Besides product name, quantity and price, you can add a category, the store where the item is to be purchased, some notes and a photo by using the camera of your device.
To create a list go to the main menu and press the plus (+) button. Then fill the fields shown in the dialog and press OKAY. There are no mandatory fields.
A default name will be used if the field \"name\" is empty. If priority \"High\" is selected, then you will see an icon (!) on the right side of the card.
Once you have created a list, you will jump automatically inside of the new list. To add a product to this list press the plus (+) button.
Then fill the fields shown in the dialog and press OKAY. The field \"Product Name\" is mandatory.

To edit, delete, or share a list or a product you must click the item and hold on pressing for about three seconds, then you see a dialog where the mentioned options are shown. After that you can select the option you would like to perform. Notice that the delete operation will not delete any data saved in the statistics.

Once you are in the list dialog (See \"Create a List\"), you can enable the statistics by using the switch button next the to icon with three bars. After this option has been switched on, items are going to be registered in the statistics as soon as the items are checked.

Notice that if you checked the product multiple times, then the product will also be registered multiple times in the statistics. This allows you to reuse the same shopping list over and over and being able to keep track of your purchases.
Once you are in the list dialog (See \"Create a List\"), you can set a deadline to the list by clicking the checkbox (\"Deadline\") and adding a date and a time.

If the deadline has passed and there are still unchecked items in the list, then the vertical bar on the left side of the list item will turn red. If all items are checked, then the bar is gray. The default color of this bar is blue. If a deadline is set you will see the date and the time in the card as well.

If you have setup a deadline (See \"Setup a Deadline\"), then you will see the option to setup a reminder. Switch the reminder option on and select how many minutes hours, days or weeks before you want the app to remind you about this list. The reminder appears as a notifications and uses the notification default sound of your device.

If the reminder has already been triggered, then the vertical bar on the left side of the list item will turn yellow. If a reminder is set then you will see an alarm icon next to the deadline. This icon will be red if the notifications have been disabled in settings.

To sort items use the icon with the three horizontal lines located in the action bar. After clicking in this icon you will see two groups of options. You can select whether the items should be sorted ascending or descending and the parameter that should be used to sort the items.

To delete multiple items use the trashcan icon located in the action bar. After clicking in this icon you will have a view where you can select all the items that should be deleted. Once you are done selecting the items, press the trashcan icon located at bottom and confirm the action. The items will now be successfully deleted.
Notice that the delete operation will not delete any data saved in the statistics.

To search for products in a list use the magnifier glass icon located in the action bar of the current list. After clicking in this icon you will see a field, where you can type the words you are looking for.
As you type, the product list will be filtered, showing only the products that match the search. You can manipulate the filtered products as before.

You can use the device\'s camera to take a picture of a certain product and save it. This option is located in the add product dialog (See \"Add a Product\"), or in the edit product dialog (See \"Edit, Delete or Remove\").

Once you are there, click on the arrow to see more options. You will see a blue camera icon that will allow you using the camera of your device to take and save a picture of a product. Please notice that this image can only be accessed by the Privacy Friendly Shopping List App. There is no possibility to share this image.
In the settings page you can customize some options to make the app more comfortable for you.

You can choose for example whether the checkbox to check products should be on the left or on the right, whether the notifications should be on/off, and some other options. Visit the settings section to find out more!

This permission is needed in order to be able to take a picture and add it to a product. If this permission is denied, this feature cannot be used. Denying this permission will not affect any of the other features.
This list does not contain any products.

Statistics are disabled for this list.
